title: Brussels Sprout & Apple Salad
summary: Brussels Sprout & Apple Salad might be just the side dish you are searching for. For $3.46 per serving, this recipe covers 21% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. One serving contains 412 calories, 8g of protein, and 33g of fat. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and vegetarian diet. 23 people have tried and liked this recipe. If you have kosher salt & ground pepper - optional at the end, galan apples, peanut oil, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 92%, this dish is tremendous. Try Apple And Brussels Sprout Salad, Apple and Pistachio Brussels Sprout Salad, and Apple And Pomegranate Brussels Sprout Salad for similar recipes.
